data.message: God in the name Jesus i come to your mighty presence and tell you that i in Jesus name choose to share all the blessings and baruchs that you have stored up for me in Heaven...and i choose to share these blessings and baruchs with everyone and everything and through Jesus the King of Kings distributing these blessings and baruchs upon everyone and everything, basically Jesus deciding who gets what blessing and baruch...and in Jesus name through you I invite everyone and everything to share the blessings and baruchs you have stored up for them, through you distributing, with myself Harrison Garrett aka Chimon of Europe! and now i tell a message for the humans..Us Mercurians like to share our blessings and baruchs with others!
